RMSF Variant Facade

Facade exposing per-atom and per-residue RMSF services.

class mdxplain.analysis.structure.services.rmsf_variant_facade.RMSFVariantFacade(pipeline_data: PipelineData | None, metric: str)

Bases: object

Expose per-atom and per-residue RMSF services for a fixed metric.

Lazily initialises the per-atom service and the residue aggregation facade, ensuring both reuse the same pipeline context and deviation metric.

Returns

RMSFVariantFacade

Helper object that provides access to per-atom and per-residue RMSF services for a specific deviation metric.

Examples

>>> facade = RMSFVariantFacade(pipeline_data, metric="mean")
>>> isinstance(facade.per_atom, RMSFPerAtomService)
True
__init__(pipeline_data: PipelineData | None, metric: str) → None

Store the pipeline context and deviation metric for child services.

Ensures that pipeline data was injected prior to accessing RMSF services and records the metric shared by per-atom and per-residue computations.

Parameters

pipeline_dataPipelineData | None

Pipeline context injected by the analysis manager.

metricstr

Robust deviation metric ("mean", "median", or "mad").

Returns

None

The initializer does not return anything.

Examples

>>> facade = RMSFVariantFacade(pipeline_data, metric="mean")
>>> isinstance(facade, RMSFVariantFacade)
True
property per_atom: RMSFPerAtomService

Access the per-atom RMSF service for the configured metric.

Lazily instantiates the per-atom RMSF service using the stored pipeline data and deviation metric.

Parameters

None

This property does not accept parameters.

Returns

RMSFPerAtomService

Metric-specific per-atom RMSF service exposing to_*_reference helpers.

Examples

>>> facade = RMSFVariantFacade(pipeline_data, metric="median")
>>> service = facade.per_atom
>>> service.metric
'median'
property per_residue: RMSFPerResidueAggregationFacade

Access the per-residue RMSF helper for the configured metric.

Lazily instantiates the residue aggregation facade using the stored pipeline data and deviation metric.

Parameters

None

This property does not accept parameters.

Returns

RMSFPerResidueAggregationFacade

Facade exposing residue-level RMSF aggregations for the configured metric.

Examples

>>> facade = RMSFVariantFacade(pipeline_data, metric="mad")
>>> per_residue = facade.per_residue
>>> isinstance(per_residue.with_mean_aggregation, RMSFPerResidueService)
True
